comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See crossoflaeken.blogspot.com/2009/07/princess-louise-marie-... which uses this picture and describes her as the "Louise-Marie, eldest daughter of King Leopold II and Queen Marie-Henriette. She was born February 18, 1858" See aso en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Louise-Marie_of_Belgium

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: In the summer of 1913 she was in the news in relation to her debts: NYT, July 8, 1913, SEIZES PRINCESS'S TRUNKS.; Creditor Causes Scandal When Louise Returns to Brussels. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9407EEDF163DE633A... NYT, July 23, 1913, SUE A PRINCESS WHO OWES $3,000,000; The Creditors of Louise of Belgium Lodge a Bankruptcy Petition. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9404EFDE113CE633A...
